name: Noelia Cerna
input: A hope for the future is that as a state we are able to decrease the amount of AR citizens that live with housing and food insecurity.

name: Shreya Ramani
input: I cant describe NWA as anything less than home. From the calming presence of nature in our backyards to the bustling cultural heart of our town, its truly a blend that makes the area unique and dear to my heart.

name: Noelia Cerna
input: Try your best to get to know as many people that are different from you as you can - different race, different background, different age - every person has something valuable to teach us.

name: Noelia Cerna
input: I do not picture myself in a certain job or house or state - I simply like to picture myself in twenty years as being happy and healthy and doing things that bring me joy surrounded by people and a community that I love and that loves me.

name: Vinitha
input: The Indian culture I get to experience away from India is what makes this place even more special and close to my heart.

name: Sudhir Katke
input: Till date I did not come across much resistance or opposition from the mainstream population while we decided to build a temple in NWA. We could freely host events for India's Independence Day, Diwali, and Holi every year.

name: Arkansas Soul Writers
input: I think what's most unique and special about Bentonville, what makes Bentonville a place anybody would want to call home is how it was designed. It was designed with community in mind.

name: Noelia Cerna
input: After two years of a pandemic and after everything we have been through collectively there are still good people in the world spreading kindness. It helps to focus on them in order to not lose hope.

name: Medhansh Sankaran
input: I dont know what to expect in 20 years. I just hope the experiences I carry will further shape me as an individual.

name: Noelia Cerna
input: The Latin American/Latinx identity is not as well reflected as one would hope it would be in terms of equality and everything that comes with that word but there is always hope for the future and for those coming after.

name: Medhansh Sankaran
input: The best piece of advice Ive ever been given was by my dad that always tells me to live in the moment and just strive to be happy.

name: Noelia Cerna
input: It is for the benefit of our children and our children's children to give them a world that is more beautiful than we found it.

name: Arkansas Soul Writers
input: One of the best pieces of advice that I was ever given was go take a walk. Take a walk when you are feeling happy, take a walk when you are feeling sad. Take a walk when you are feeling down and motivation is not there.

name: Medhansh Sankaran
input: I hope that when I come back from college that I can visit these monuments of my childhood and remember that I am just a kid from Arkansas.

name: Noelia Cerna
input: In twenty years I hope the state of AR sees an increased diversity in its population and a community focused on learning from each others cultures and sharing food, family events and customs. I hope we realize that we are stronger together.

name: Arkansas Soul Writers
input: When you walk in peace you start to see more light in your life.

name: Noelia Cerna
input: A hope for the future would be that we are able to truly concentrate on the issue of saving and preserving the planet. There are so many things we can do as a state to help.

name: Noelia Cerna
input: A hope for the future is that we as a state are some day able to truly accept our history - both the good and ugly parts of it - in order to ensure a safe and truly equal quality of life for all of our citizens.

name: Arkansas Soul Writers
input: My hope for the future? I see poverty being ended. I see nobody going hungry. I see nobody being homeless.

name: Allan Paulose
input: My hope for the future is harmony and prosperity in diversity, in NWA and beyond.

name: Noelia Cerna
input: In twenty years I hope to see our state and its people truly thriving, developing strong communities and making sure every Arkansan has the help and support they need to make the overall health of our state better than ever before.

name: Noelia Cerna
input: Part of living is joy. Embrace it and laugh.

name: Caddo creation story, Acee Blue Eagle
input: Soon they reached the opening. First an old man climbed out, carrying fire and a pipe in one hand and a drum in the other. Next came his wife, bringing corn and pumpkin seeds.

name: Noelia Cerna
input: Some advice about kindness - if you would not say it to somebody else, dont say it to yourself either.

name: Edith Irby Jones
input: The world is going to be changed, and all of us are gonna be made better when we can understand the needs that each of us haveall of us have.

name: Edith Irby Jones
input: Well find out that whoever the divine maker was, He made enough of everything for everybody, and all we need to do is to learn how to share it, learn how to get along, and know that everybody else deserves the same rights that we want for ourselves.

name: Noelia Cerna
input: A hope for the future is that we will realize that despite our differences we have more in common than we could ever imagine and if we were to truly work together we could accomplish some amazing and beautiful things.

name: Noelia Cerna
input: A hope for the future is that our children will truly understand the power they hold to enact positive change in the world and that they will be brave enough and strong enough to use that power for good.

name: Noelia Cerna
input: A wonderful piece of advice has been to concentrate on the people that are doing good things especially when times are dark.
